scripts.dev:db:reset: (docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d) || (docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d)
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:db && sleep 5 && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/smart-study-tracker && npm install
scripts.db:logs: docker compose logs -f postgres || docker-compose logs -f postgres
scripts.db:shell: docker exec -it smart_study_db psql -U postgres -d smart_study_tracker
scripts.setup:
npm run install:all && npm run dev:db && echo '
